tool.name: Change Grid Values - Flood Fill
tool.description: A flood fill algorithm will be used for replacement of grid cell values starting at the positions of the input points. If one or more points are selected, only these will be processed, otherwise all. If the target grid is not set, the changes will be applied to the original grid.

param.name: REPLACE_VALUE
param.label: Fixed value to be replaced
param.help: Replace only this value with respect to the specified tolerance.

param.name: IGNORE_NODATA
param.label: Ignore No-Data
param.help: Do not fill areas representing no-data.
